title: Land for Sale
details:
Kurunegala - Negombo main road (Katunayake Air Port road)
Narammala city limit, In a good residential area
60m from the main road(main road visible from the land)
Fine location for(an/a) - International School, Tourist Hotel or a factory

Utilities - Pipe born water, Three phase electricity, Telephone lines

Have easy access to main cities and the New Kandy Highway
To Kurunagala - 15km
To Narammala - 0.7km
To Kandy Higway exit - 4km
